eventsAnnotated.name: 2012 Guatemala Earthquake
eventsAnnotated.description: The 2012 Guatemala earthquake occurred on November 7 at 10:35:47 local time in the Pacific Ocean, 35 kilometres (22 mi) south of Champerico in the department of Retalhuleu. The user is a response officer in the command and control center responsible for responding to the earthquake as it unfolds. <a href='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012_Guatemala_earthquake' target='_blank'>Wikipedia Page<a>

eventsAnnotated.name: 2013 Boston Bombings
eventsAnnotated.description: During the annual Boston Marathon on April 15, 2013 homemade bombs detonated near the finish line of the race. The user is a response officer in the Massachusetts command and control center who is just recieving notifications of an explosion. <a href='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boston_Marathon_bombing' target='_blank'>Wikipedia Page<a>

eventsAnnotated.name: 2018 FL School Shooting
eventsAnnotated.description: On February 14, 2018, a gunman opened fire at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Florida. The user is a response officer in the Florida command and control center who is just recieving reports of the shooting. <a href='https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stoneman_Douglas_High_School_shooting' target='_blank'>Wikipedia Page<a>
